setting.location: Country road approaching aristocratic manor house in Mazovian countryside, 50km from Warsaw, Congress Poland estate
setting.weather: Golden late afternoon sun, scattered clouds

characters.appearance: Man in early 40s, dark hair, tense anticipation in posture
characters.clothing: Fine traveling coat, top hat, leather gloves
characters.action: Leaning forward to glimpse approaching manor through trees

characters.appearance: Coachman in his 50s, weathered face, steady hands
characters.clothing: Dark livery with brass buttons, tall driver's hat
characters.position: Driving the carriage from high seat
characters.action: Guiding matched pair of bay horses along tree-lined drive

scene.mainElements: Elegant carriage approaching grand manor house through avenue of old trees, late afternoon sun filtering through leaves, impressive estate revealing itself
scene.details: Black lacquered carriage with family crest on door, matched bay horses with polished harnesses, poplar trees creating natural archway, manor house with white columns visible ahead, manicured gardens glimpsed through trees, iron gates standing open, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Rolling Polish countryside with wheat fields, distant forest, other estate buildings
scene.atmosphere: Anticipation and social climbing, the merchant approaching the aristocratic world he longs to enter

composition.cameraAngle: Following shot from behind and above the carriage
composition.focus: The carriage progressing toward the imposing manor house
composition.depth: Carriage and horses in foreground, tree-lined drive in middle, manor house in background

lineArt.weight: very fine, built up in layers
